title: AI Engineer
bullets: Developed and deployed multi-step agentic workflows using Langchain Agents and LangGraph with Azure integrations to streamline banking operations for different departments
Containerized Python and .NET applications to automate the data ingestion processes to different knowledge bases utilizing Docker and Azure DevOps pipelines
Built and validated searchable knowledge bases on Azure AI Search for different internal and external chatbot
Worked on the development of custom chatbot interfaces using Open WebUI framework

title: AI Engineer
bullets: Developed a web-based GenAI chatbot leveraging LLMs on Azure Cloud, enhancing client’s internal knowledge transfer
Built a searchable knowledge base on Azure AI Search through chunking and vectorization of web-parsed and internal documents, boosting Chatbot Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) performance
Automated knowledge base updates using Azure Function App pipelines and monitored logs via PostgreSQL

Developed a multi-agent system using LangChain Agents and LangGraph to aggregate data from web sources, Greek Business Registry, and internal Databricks tables, generating automated bulletins for Credit Risk analysis

title: Junior Data Analyst
bullets: Perform advanced prompt engineering techniques and model tuning, utilizing the OpenAI API in Python, leading to a 20% increase in the company’s information extraction processes
Created a translation tool using open-source libraries and Azure cognitive services deployed on Power automate
Streamlined manual processes by deploying parsing Python scripts on Power Automate, saving ~15 hours weekly

Developed a low-code application using the AppSmith framework and JavaScript, integrated with SQL Server and FastAPI, and deployed on Azure using Docker to improve the visibility of the company’s pricing guidance product

title: Technical Writer
bullets: Worked as a technical writer for Unstract, a startup that provides a platform for end-to-end document processing and information extraction.
Created technical blogs for the Unstract platform, including API tutorials, and integration guides.
Documented the Unstract platform's features and capabilities, setting up an end-to-end documentation for the workflow
